article: There are a few memories from our childhood that will stay with us forever. A few that seemed so  _  at the time may cause us to smile years later. One such memory is a phone call I  _  when I was about three or four years old. My mother had entered a contest on a local  _  show. Entrants were to tell an interesting story about their  _  . Suddenly, in a very pleasant tone of  _  , Mrs. Santa Claus asked me about my art work. I  _  that this lady was the real Mrs. Claus, not a radio station actress standing in for her.
